arts.ttl: Suriname sentenced to Gold Cup play-offs following two-legged defeat to Canada
arts.sum: Suriname lost the second leg of their CONCACAF Nations League tie with Canada 3-0, adding to a 1-0 deficit from the first game.

arts.ttl: Mexico overcomes 2-goal deficit, reaches CONCACAF Nations League semifinals with US, Canada, Panama
arts.sum: At Toronto, Jonathan David got his record 31st goal for Canada and Jacob Shaffelburg scored twice in a 3-0 win over Suriname for a 4-0 aggregate victory. With Mexico coming off a 2-0 loss in the first leg on Friday at San Pedro Sula, Jiménez started the comeback in the 42nd minute when he scored from Jesús Orozco’s cross for his 35th international goal.

arts.ttl: Jonathan David sets his sights on Barcelona amid Interest from Juventus and Inter
arts.sum: Talented Canadian forward Jonathan David has become one of the most talked-about players in the transfer market as his contract with Lille approaches its expiration at the end of the season. With several clubs eyeing a potential move, including Juventus and Inter, David has made his dream clear: he wants to play for Barcelona. “The Barcelona has been the team I’ve supported since I was a child, so your dream becomes to play for them,” David told The Athletic, expressing his long-standing admiration for the Catalan club. arts.ttl: Barcelona told ASTRONOMICAL cost of 'free' Jonathan David
arts.sum: After revealing that his agent is busy talking to clubs, the outlet asserted that the full value of David's next contract would amount to at least €80 million. Barcelona told ASTRONOMICAL cost of 'free' Jonathan David

arts.ttl: Jonathan David ‘dreams’ of playing for Barcelona
arts.sum: Jonathan David’s (24) future remains in doubt with the striker’s contract at Lille OSC set to expire in June. It was a surprise that David remained in the north of…

arts.ttl: Jonathan David, the Real Madrid slayer who dreams to play for Barcelona
arts.sum: R eal Madrid had not lost a Champions League match since May 2023, until they met LOSC Lille last October in a match in which Jonathan David scored the goal that toppled the Spanish giants on the second matchday of the top European competition. Although he has been playing at a high level in France for several years now, David's name is not one that is being touted as one of the best in his position.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich step up pursuit of Jonathan David: Implications for Inter and Juventus
arts.sum: Jonathan David is set to become one of the most sought-after players in the upcoming summer transfer market. The Lille striker has made it clear that he will not renew his contract, which expires on June 30, 2025. As a result, top clubs across Europe are placing him at the top of their wish lists. Calciomercato report how Bayern Munich has emerged as a serious contender for David’s signature.
